channel.title: RichScape V4 BETA
channel.description: Just a quick question.... When RichScape "V4 BETA" starts up, it comes up with 'about' & 'Log In'. When I click Log in, enter a user and pass, it comes up with error connecting to server. so...from a previous question i've found out that you have to run another server, like TestScape, to log on. Anyway, is RichScape, with all the added items like godswords, 3rd age etc, if you logon to your server 'via' RichScape, do you then gain access to 3rd age and GS's ?? Also..how do you log on to a Pimpscape server via RichScape, because I'm not sure how to change the Port to 5555.

item.title: RichScape V4 BETA
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

Darkness Pk:

When you say it comes with login and about. That’s the client which is used to login.

ah yea…i think ive worked it out now…
So the RichScape client is used to log in to your own server, or someone elses, like Moparscape?

Read full topic

item.title: RichScape V4 BETA
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

Just to tell you:

  1. You have a server with all files E.G. char files.
  2. Client is used to connect to server and play

To connect via your client to your server you can or if the server is ran on the same computer as client is use nothing/localhost.
If not than use your IP adress…

When you say it comes with login and about. That’s the client which is used to login.

Anyway I can’t really explain, you should take a look at some other boards and you will know and can book progress.

Read full topic

item.title: RichScape V4 BETA
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

lol…i no 10x more than what most people my age would ;D
(not trying to be arrogant)

huh?? im not sure how to change the “port” to 5555, because richscape is stuck on 49375 or watever…

and i already no how to get the ip address…everyone that has anything to do with computers should know that =S (no offense to anyone)

Read full topic

item.title: RichScape V4 BETA
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

Wow dude you have to learn alot.

how to change the IP to 5555.
5555 Is the port of the server. IP adress is something like 180.153.23.1 or anything else, to find your IP open up a command line and put in: [code]ipconfig[/code]

NOTE: if it says something like cannot find command you have to CD to windows32 map

Read full topic

item.title: RichScape V4 BETA
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

Just a quick question…
When RichScape “V4 BETA” starts up, it comes up with ‘about’ & ‘Log In’.
When I click Log in, enter a user and pass, it comes up with error connecting to server.
so…from a previous question i’ve found out that you have to run another server, like TestScape, to log on.
Anyway, is RichScape, with all the added items like godswords, 3rd age etc, if you logon to your server ‘via’ RichScape, do you then gain access to 3rd age and GS’s ??
Also…how do you log on to a Pimpscape server via RichScape, because I’m not sure how to change the Port to 5555.

Read full topic
